import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {RegistrationRequest} from '../../../services/models/registration-request'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { hide = true; registerRequest: RegistrationRequest = {email: '', motDePasse: '', nom: '' , phoneNumber: '' , prenom: '' , roles: 'Student'}; errorMsg: Array = []; }
